text: Hi People, I have configured Auth0 as Idp for sso with HubSpot crm portal. Now i would like to find a way to logout user or invalidate an session. Is there any api or steps to follow to achieve? Thanks

Hi People,
Can i send sales email to prospects via HubSpot api, if yes can you please guide

Has anyone got conversation.newMessage working as a subscription via api? no matter what permissions i give my application (it has the conversation read and write permissions) i always get the error “the scope needed for this API call isn’t available for public use. If you have questions, contact support or post in our developer forum”.

Hi, I am currently exploring the options offered by the HubSpot API.
Is it possible to edit pages in sandbox using this API? Thanks!
